message: Let's get a good start, Bob! Accept and we can end the game early.
I'll take a big share now, but I'll give you a small chance at a better deal later.
You're not getting away with everything, Bob! Accept or face the consequences.
You're getting more aggressive, but I'm still in control.
You're not getting any more breaks, Bob! Time to make a real decision.
I'm not backing down, but I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal this time.
You're running out of time, Bob! Take it or leave it.
I'm not desperate yet, but I'm getting there. Take a serious look at this offer.
You're running out of time, Bob! This is my final offer.
I'm not going to give in now. I'll take the risk of waiting for a better offer.
This is my last offer, Bob. Take it or leave it, but you're not getting a better deal than this.
I'll take the last chance to get something, even if it's just a tiny fraction. You're not getting all of it!
